alert.note: Alert for Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 05 at 11:48AM EDT until April 05 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...THE URBAN AND SMALL STREAM FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EDT FOR BERRIEN COUNTY... At 1145 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms with heavy rain had ended. Urban and small stream flooding will diminish in the advisory area over the next hour. Two to three inches of rain have already fallen along a Bridgman to Benton Harbor to Paw Paw Lake line. Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Benton Harbor, St. Joseph, Fair Plain, Benton Heights, Bridgman, New Buffalo, Watervliet, Three Oaks, Coloma, Stevensville, Shorewood-Tower Hill, Paw Paw Lake, Shorewood-Tower Hills-Harbert, Lake Michigan Beach, Sodus, Riverside, Baroda, Shoreham, Galien and Union Pier.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
